alert.note: Alert for Russell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 8:05PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Clinton and far southern Russell Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 704 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Albany, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Russell and central Clinton Counties, including the following locations... Desda, Cartwright, Snow, Cumberland City, Highway, Ida, Marlow, Seventy Six, Decide and Aaron. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
